alert.note: Alert for Estancia Valley; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 1:02PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BERNALILLO AND NORTHWESTERN TORRANCE COUNTIES THROUGH 130 PM MDT... At 101 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Escabosa, or 15 miles southwest of Moriarty, moving north/northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Moriarty, Chilili, Escabosa, Ponderosa Pines and Miera. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.

area.areaDesc: Estancia Valley; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood
